text: 21:8 Matyu 25:41; Efesus 5:5; 1 Timoti 1:9; Hibru 12:14; Akar Mogomem 19:20; 20:14-15; 21:27; 22:15Eghtɨ gumazamizir atiatia ua gɨrakɨrangɨn zuiba ko, nɨghnɨzir gavgavim ataghiziba ko, gumazamizir arazir bar kurar mɨzɨrɨzibagh amiba ko, gumazir gumazamizibav sozi me ariaghɨriba ko, gumazamiziba uari ko akua amir araziba ko, akuzibagh amua egha imezibagh amir gumaziba ko, asebar ziaba feba ko, gumazamizir ifavariba, me bar uan nguibamɨn mangam. Kar danganir avim ko salfan dagɨar avir bar puvɨra isim. Kar ovever namba 2.”
